product_service.core_offering: Premium biomechanical insoles that relieve plantar fasciitis and knee pain within 14 days.
product_service.delivery_model: Physical product with a guided mobility program

founder_assets.backstory: After years of plantar fasciitis from standing work, the founder studied biomechanics and built a prototype that finally stopped the pain.
character_flaws: Once dismissed orthotics as a crutch
strong_opinions: Soft cushioning without structure prolongs pain
Support must be earned by alignment, not bulk

market_evidence.pain_statement: My feet are on fire by mid-afternoon and I dread every step.
failed_alternatives: Cheap gel insoles flatten in days
Generic stretching routines with no feedback
Pain meds that mask but do not fix

cost_structure.notes: Manufacturing, shipping, returns, and payment fees

operational_constraints.technical_capability: Shopify, email automation, and lightweight custom frontend

conversion_data.notes: Last 90 days from Shopify and GA4

testimonials: I walked a full shift without pain for the first time in years.
The arch support feels precise, not bulky.
My morning steps stopped feeling sharp within a week.
failures: Broad interest targeting underperformed on Meta
Discount-heavy offers lowered trust and raised returns
